name: Block Blast-Block Puzzle Games
description:
Block Blast is a Tetris-like puzzle game, challenging to eliminate as many blocks as possible in a limited space to get a higher score. It's also a simple yet challenging elimination game with logic skills and layout strategies, and every move determines whether you can get a high score.

Game rules:
- Drag and drop blocks to the board to achieve row and column padding to eliminate them.
- Scores will be awarded for each step placed, and the game ends when there is no room for blocks on the board.

Game Features:
- Beautiful blocks and satisfying eliminate sound effects.
- Can play offline and enjoy Block Blast anytime, anywhere.

Let Block Blast tease your brain! No matter where you are, whether you are tired or depressed, Block Blast will sweep away your dull emotions and bring you a novel gaming experience. Exercise your brain in Block Blast and enjoy a good leisure time!
